EFFECT.name: Init
EFFECT.desc: Called when the effect is created.

EFFECT.name: PhysicsCollide
EFFECT.desc: Called when the effect collides with anything.

EFFECT.name: Render
EFFECT.desc: Called when the effect should be rendered.

EFFECT.name: Think
EFFECT.desc: Called when the effect should think, return false to kill the effect.

ENT.name: AcceptInput
ENT.desc: Called when another entity fires an event to this entity.
Called when the entity is blocked.

ENT.name: CalcAbsolutePosition
ENT.desc: Called whenever the entity's position changes.

ENT.name: CanProperty
ENT.desc: Controls if a property can be used on this entity or not.

ENT.name: DoingEngineSchedule
ENT.desc: Called whenever an engine schedule is being ran.

ENT.name: DoSchedule
ENT.desc: Runs a Lua schedule. Runs tasks inside the schedule.

ENT.name: Draw
ENT.desc: Called when the entity should be drawn.

ENT.name: DrawTranslucent
ENT.desc: Called when the entity should be drawn translucently.

ENT.name: EndTouch
ENT.desc: Called when the entity stops touching another entity.
Called whenever an engine schedule is finished.

ENT.name: ExpressionFinished
ENT.desc: {{Validate}}Called when an NPC's expression has finished.

ENT.name: GetAttackSpread
ENT.desc: {{Validate}} Called to determine how good an NPC is at using a particular weapon.

ENT.name: GetRelationship
ENT.desc: Called when scripted NPC needs to check how he "feels" against another entity.

ENT.name: ImpactTrace
ENT.desc: Called when a bullet trace hits this entity and allows you to override the default behavior by returning true.

ENT.name: Initialize
ENT.desc: Called when the entity is created. This is called when you {{ClassFunction|Entity|Spawn}} the custom entity.

ENT.name: IsTranslucent
ENT.desc: Called whenever the entity should tell if it's translucent or not.

ENT.name: KeyValue
ENT.desc: Called when the engine sets a value for this entity.

ENT.name: NextTask
ENT.desc: Start the next task in specific schedule.

ENT.name: OnCondition
ENT.desc: Called each time the NPC updates its condition.

ENT.name: OnEntityCopyTableFinish
ENT.desc: Called after duplicator finishes saving the entity, allowing you to modify the save data.

ENT.name: OnReloaded
ENT.desc: Called when the entity is reloaded by the auto-reload system.

ENT.name: OnRemove
ENT.desc: Called when the entity is about to be removed.

ENT.name: OnRestore
ENT.desc: Called when the entity was reloaded from a save game.

ENT.name: OnTakeDamage
ENT.desc: Called when the entity is taking damage.

ENT.name: OnTaskComplete
ENT.desc: Called from the engine when TaskComplete is called.

ENT.name: PassesTriggerFilters
ENT.desc: Polls whenever the entity should trigger the brush.

ENT.name: PhysicsCollide
ENT.desc: Called when the entity collides with anything.

ENT.name: PhysicsSimulate
ENT.desc: Called from the Entity's motion controller to simulate physics.

ENT.name: PhysicsUpdate
ENT.desc: Called whenever the physics of the entity are updated.

ENT.name: PostEntityCopy
ENT.desc: Called after the duplicator finished copying the entity

ENT.name: PostEntityPaste
ENT.desc: Called after the duplicator pastes the entity

ENT.name: PreEntityCopy
ENT.desc: Called before the duplicator copies the entity.

ENT.name: RenderOverride
ENT.desc: Called instead of the engine drawing function of the entity.

ENT.name: RunAI
ENT.desc: Called from the engine every 0.1 seconds.

ENT.name: RunEngineTask
ENT.desc: Runs an engine task.

ENT.name: RunTask
ENT.desc: Called every think on running task.

ENT.name: ScheduleFinished
ENT.desc: Called whenever a schedule is finished.

ENT.name: SelectSchedule
ENT.desc: Set the schedule we should be playing right now.

ENT.name: SetTask
ENT.desc: Sets the current task.

ENT.name: SetupDataTables
ENT.desc: Called when the entity should set up its [[Networking Entities| Data Tables]].

ENT.name: SpawnFunction
ENT.desc: This is the spawn function. It's called when a client calls the entity to be spawned.

ENT.name: StartEngineSchedule
ENT.desc: Starts an engine schedule.

ENT.name: StartEngineTask
ENT.desc: Starts an engine task.

ENT.name: StartSchedule
ENT.desc: Starts a schedule previously created by {{LibraryFunction|ai_schedule|New}}.

ENT.name: StartTask
ENT.desc: Called once on starting task.

ENT.name: StartTouch
ENT.desc: Called when the entity starts touching another entity.

ENT.name: StoreOutput
ENT.desc: Stores an output to be used with {{HookFunction|ENTITY|TriggerOutput}}. This function is mostly used in {{HookFunction|ENTITY|KeyValue}}

ENT.name: TaskFinished
ENT.desc: Returns true if the current running Task is finished.

ENT.name: TaskTime
ENT.desc: Returns how many seconds we've been doing this current task

ENT.name: TestCollision
ENT.desc: Allows you to override trace result when a trace hits the entitys Bounding Box.

ENT.name: Think
ENT.desc: Called every frame on the client.

ENT.name: Touch
ENT.desc: Called when another entity touches the entity.

ENT.name: TriggerOutput
ENT.desc: Triggers all outputs stored using {{HookFunction|ENTITY|StoreOutput}}.

ENT.name: UpdateTransmitState
ENT.desc: Called whenever the transmit state should be updated.

ENT.name: Use
ENT.desc: Called when another entity uses this entity, example would be a player pressing "+use" this entity.

GM.name: AcceptInput
GM.desc: Called when a map I/O event occurs.

GM.name: AddDeathNotice
GM.desc: Adds a death notice entry.

GM.name: AdjustMouseSensitivity
GM.desc: Allows you to adjust the mouse sensitivity.

GM.name: AllowPlayerPickup
GM.desc: Called when a player tries to pick up something using the "use" key, return to override.

GM.name: CalcMainActivity
GM.desc: This hook is used to calculate animations for a player.

GM.name: CalcVehicleView
GM.desc: Called from {{HookFunction|GM|CalcView}} when player is in driving a vehicle.

GM.name: CalcView
GM.desc: Allows override of the default view.

GM.name: CalcViewModelView
GM.desc: Allows overriding the position and angle of the viewmodel.

GM.name: CanEditVariable
GM.desc: Called when a variable is edited on an Entity (called by Edit Properties... menu), to determine if the edit should be permitted.

GM.name: CanExitVehicle
GM.desc: Determines if the player can exit the vehicle.

GM.name: CanPlayerEnterVehicle
GM.desc: Determines whether or not the player can enter the vehicle.

GM.name: CanPlayerSuicide
GM.desc: Determines if the player can kill themselves using the concommands "kill" or "explode".

GM.name: CanPlayerUnfreeze
GM.desc: Determines if the player can unfreeze the entity.

GM.name: CaptureVideo
GM.desc: Called each frame to record demos to video using IVideoWriter.

GM.name: ChatText
GM.desc: Called when a message is printed to the chat box. Note, that this isn't working with player messages even though there are arguments for it.

GM.name: ChatTextChanged
GM.desc: Called whenever the content of the user's chat input box is changed.

GM.name: CheckPassword
GM.desc: Called when a non local player connects to allow the Lua system to check the password.

GM.name: CloseDermaMenus
GM.desc: Called when derma menus are closed with {{GlobalFunction|CloseDermaMenus}}.

GM.name: ContextMenuOpen
GM.desc: Called when the context menu is trying to be opened. Return false to disallow it.

GM.name: CreateClientsideRagdoll
GM.desc: Called whenever an entity becomes a clientside ragdoll.

GM.name: CreateEntityRagdoll
GM.desc: Called when a ragdoll of an entity has been created.

GM.name: CreateMove
GM.desc: Allows you to change the players movements before they're sent to the server.

GM.name: CreateTeams
GM.desc: Teams are created within this hook using {{LibraryFunction|team|SetUp}}.

GM.name: DoAnimationEvent
GM.desc: Called upon an animation event, this is the ideal place to call player animation functions such as {{ClassFunction|Player|AddVCDSequenceToGestureSlot}}, {{ClassFunction|Player|AnimRestartGesture}} and so on.

GM.name: DoPlayerDeath
GM.desc: Handles the player's death.

GM.name: DrawDeathNotice
GM.desc: This hook is called every frame to draw all of the current death notices.

GM.name: DrawMonitors
GM.desc: Called every frame before drawing the in-game monitors ( Breencast, in-game TVs, etc ), but doesn't seem to be doing anything, trying to render 2D or 3D elements fail.

GM.name: DrawOverlay
GM.desc: [[Category:Menu_Hooks]] Called after all other 2D draw hooks are called. Draws over all VGUI Panels and HUDs.

GM.name: DrawPhysgunBeam
GM.desc: Allows you to override physgun beam drawing.

GM.name: EndEntityDriving
GM.desc: Called right before an entity stops driving. Overriding this hook will cause it to not call {{LibraryFunction|drive|End}} and the player will not stop driving.

GM.name: EntityEmitSound
GM.desc: Called whenever a sound has been played.

GM.name: EntityFireBullets
GM.desc: Called every time a bullet is fired from an entity.

GM.name: EntityKeyValue
GM.desc: Called when a keyvalue is set on an entity. Return a string to override the value.

GM.name: EntityNetworkedVarChanged
GM.desc: Called when an NWVar is changed.

GM.name: EntityRemoved
GM.desc: Called right before the removal of an entity.

GM.name: EntityTakeDamage
GM.desc: Called when an entity takes damage. You can modify all parts of the damage info in this hook.

GM.name: FindUseEntity
GM.desc: This hook polls the entity the player use action should be applied to.

GM.name: FinishChat
GM.desc: Runs when user cancels/finishes typing.

GM.name: FinishMove
GM.desc: Called after {{HookFunction|GM|Move}} , applies all the changes from the CMoveData to the player.

GM.name: ForceDermaSkin
GM.desc: Returns the Derma skin to be used for panels by default. If nothing is returned the default skin will be used.

GM.name: GameContentChanged
GM.desc: Called to refresh menu content once it has initialized or something has been mounted.

GM.name: GetFallDamage
GM.desc: Called when a player takes damage from falling, allows to override the damage.

GM.name: GetGameDescription
GM.desc: Returns the text to be shown in the server browser as the game.

GM.name: GetMotionBlurValues
GM.desc: Allows you to modify the Source Engine's motion blur shaders.

GM.name: GetPreferredCarryAngles
GM.desc: Called to determine preferred carry angles for the entity. It works for both, +use pickup and gravity gun pickup.

GM.name: GetTeamColor
GM.desc: Returns the color for the given entity's team. This is used in chat and deathnotice text.

GM.name: GetTeamNumColor
GM.desc: Returns the team color for the given team index.

GM.name: GetVehicles
GM.desc: Returns a table of vehicles.

GM.name: GrabEarAnimation
GM.desc: Override this hook to disable/change ear-grabbing in your gamemode.

GM.name: GravGunOnDropped
GM.desc: Called when an entity is released by a gravity gun.

GM.name: GravGunOnPickedUp
GM.desc: Called when an entity is picked up by a gravity gun.

GM.name: GravGunPickupAllowed
GM.desc: Returns whether or not a player is allowed to pick up an entity with the gravity gun. Return true to allow.

GM.name: GravGunPunt
GM.desc: Called when an entity is about to be punted with the gravity gun (primary fire). Return true to allow and false to disallow.

GM.name: GUIMouseDoublePressed
GM.desc: Called when the mouse has been double clicked. By default it calls {{HookFunction|GM|GUIMousePressed}}.

GM.name: GUIMousePressed
GM.desc: Called whenever a players presses a mouse key.

GM.name: GUIMouseReleased
GM.desc: Called whenever a players presses a mouse key.

GM.name: HandlePlayerDriving
GM.desc: Allows to override player driving animations.

GM.name: HandlePlayerDucking
GM.desc: Allows to override player crouch animations.

GM.name: HandlePlayerJumping
GM.desc: Allows to override player jumping animations.

GM.name: HandlePlayerLanding
GM.desc: Allows to override player landing animations.

GM.name: HandlePlayerNoClipping
GM.desc: Allows to override player noclip animations.

GM.name: HandlePlayerSwimming
GM.desc: Allows to override player swimming animations.

GM.name: HandlePlayerVaulting
GM.desc: Allows to override player flying ( in mid-air, not noclipping ) animations.

GM.name: HideTeam
GM.desc: Hides the team selection panel.

GM.name: HUDAmmoPickedUp
GM.desc: Called when the client has picked up ammo. Override to disable default HUD notification.

GM.name: HUDDrawPickupHistory
GM.desc: Renders the HUD pick-up history. Override to hide default or draw your own HUD.

GM.name: HUDDrawScoreBoard
GM.desc: Called every frame to render the scoreboard. It is recommended to use Derma and VGUI for this job instead of this hook. Called right after {{HookFunction|GM|HUDPaint}}.

GM.name: HUDDrawTargetID
GM.desc: Called from {{HookFunction|GM|HUDPaint}} to draw player info when you hover over a player with your crosshair or mouse.

GM.name: HUDItemPickedUp
GM.desc: Called when an item has been picked up. Override to disable the default HUD notification.

GM.name: HUDPaint
GM.desc: Called whenever the HUD should be drawn. Called right before {{HookFunction|GM|HUDDrawScoreBoard}} and after {{HookFunction|GM|HUDPaintBackground}}.

GM.name: HUDPaintBackground
GM.desc: Called whenever the HUD background is being drawn. Things rendered in this hook will '''always''' appear behind things rendered in {{HookFunction|GM|HUDPaint}}.

GM.name: HUDShouldDraw
GM.desc: Called when the Gamemode is about to draw a given element on the client's HUD (heads-up display).

GM.name: HUDWeaponPickedUp
GM.desc: Called when a weapon has been picked up. Override to disable the default HUD notification.

GM.name: Initialize
GM.desc: Called after the gamemode loads and starts.

GM.name: InitPostEntity
GM.desc: Called after all the entities are initialized.

GM.name: InputMouseApply
GM.desc: Allows you to modify the supplied User Command with mouse input. This could be used to make moving the mouse do funky things to view angles.

GM.name: IsSpawnpointSuitable
GM.desc: Check if a player can spawn at a certain spawnpoint.

GM.name: KeyPress
GM.desc: Called whenever a player pressed a key included within the IN keys.

GM.name: KeyRelease
GM.desc: Runs when a IN key was released by a player.

GM.name: MenuStart
GM.desc: Called when ''menu.lua'' has finished loading.

GM.name: MouthMoveAnimation
GM.desc: Override this gamemode function to disable mouth movement when talking on voice chat.

GM.name: Move
GM.desc: The Move hook is called for you to manipulate the player's MoveData.

GM.name: NeedsDepthPass
GM.desc: Returning true in this hook will cause it to render depth buffers defined with {{LibraryFunction|render|GetResolvedFullFrameDepth}}.

GM.name: NetworkEntityCreated
GM.desc: Called when an entity has been created over the network.

GM.name: NetworkIDValidated
GM.desc: Called when a player has been validated by Steam.
Called whenever this entity changes its transmission state for this {{GlobalFunction|LocalPlayer}}, such as exiting or re entering the PVS.

GM.name: OnAchievementAchieved
GM.desc: Called when a player has achieved an achievement. You can get the name and other information from an achievement ID with the achievements library.

GM.name: OnChatTab
GM.desc: Called when the local player presses TAB while having their chatbox opened.

GM.name: OnContextMenuClose
GM.desc: Called when the context menu was closed.

GM.name: OnContextMenuOpen
GM.desc: Called when the context menu was opened.

GM.name: OnDamagedByExplosion
GM.desc: Called when a player has been hurt by an explosion. Override to disable default sound effect.

GM.name: OnEntityCreated
GM.desc: Called right after the Entity has been made visible to Lua.

GM.name: OnGamemodeLoaded
GM.desc: Called when the gamemode is loaded.

GM.name: OnLuaError
GM.desc: Called when a Lua error occurs, only works in the Menu realm.

GM.name: OnNPCKilled
GM.desc: Called whenever an NPC is killed.

GM.name: OnPhysgunFreeze
GM.desc: Called when a player freezes an entity with the Physgun.

GM.name: OnPhysgunReload
GM.desc: Called when a player reloads with the physgun. Override this to disable default unfreezing behavior.

GM.name: OnPlayerChangedTeam
GM.desc: Called when a player has changed team.

GM.name: OnPlayerChat
GM.desc: Called whenever another player send a chat message. For the serverside equivalent, see {{HookFunction|GM|PlayerSay}}.

GM.name: OnPlayerHitGround
GM.desc: Called when a player makes contact with the ground.

GM.name: OnReloaded
GM.desc: Called when gamemode has been reloaded by auto refresh.

GM.name: OnSpawnMenuClose
GM.desc: Called when a player closes the spawn menu.

GM.name: OnSpawnMenuOpen
GM.desc: Called when a player opens the Spawn Menu.

GM.name: OnTextEntryGetFocus
GM.desc: Called when a DTextEntry gets focus.

GM.name: OnTextEntryLoseFocus
GM.desc: Called when DTextEntry loses focus.

GM.name: OnUndo
GM.desc: Called when the player undoes something.

GM.name: OnViewModelChanged
GM.desc: Called when the player changes their weapon to another one - and their viewmodel model changes.

GM.name: PhysgunDrop
GM.desc: Called when a player drops an entity with the Physgun.

GM.name: PhysgunPickup
GM.desc: Called whenever a player picks up an entity with the Physgun.

GM.name: PlayerAuthed
GM.desc: Commands to run once a player is authenticated.

GM.name: PlayerBindPress
GM.desc: Runs when a bind has been pressed. Allows to block commands.

GM.name: PlayerButtonDown
GM.desc: Called when a player presses a button.

GM.name: PlayerButtonUp
GM.desc: Called when a player releases a button.

GM.name: PlayerCanHearPlayersVoice
GM.desc: Polls if a player can be heard by another player.

GM.name: PlayerCanJoinTeam
GM.desc: Returns whether or not a player is allowed to join a team

GM.name: PlayerCanPickupItem
GM.desc: Returns whether or not a player is allowed to pick an item up.

GM.name: PlayerCanPickupWeapon
GM.desc: Returns whether or not a player is allowed to pick up a weapon.

GM.name: PlayerCanSeePlayersChat
GM.desc: Returns whether or not the player can see the other player's chat.

GM.name: PlayerConnect
GM.desc: Executes when a player connects to the server.

GM.name: PlayerDeath
GM.desc: Called when a player is killed by {{ClassFunction|Player|Kill}} or any other normal means, except for when the player is killed with {{ClassFunction|Player|KillSilent}}.

GM.name: PlayerDeathSound
GM.desc: Returns whether or not the default death sound should be muted.

GM.name: PlayerDeathThink
GM.desc: Called every think while the player is dead. The return value will determine if the player respawns.

GM.name: PlayerDisconnected
GM.desc: Called when a player leaves the server.

GM.name: PlayerDriveAnimate
GM.desc: Called to update the player's animation during a drive.

GM.name: PlayerEndVoice
GM.desc: Called when player stops using voice chat.

GM.name: PlayerEnteredVehicle
GM.desc: Called when a player enters a vehicle. Note: although this hook is defined in the base gamemode as shared, it doesn't appear to be called clientside.

GM.name: PlayerFootstep
GM.desc: Called whenever a player steps. Return true to mute the normal sound.

GM.name: PlayerFrozeObject
GM.desc: Called when a player freezes an object.

GM.name: PlayerHurt
GM.desc: Called when a player gets hurt.

GM.name: PlayerInitialSpawn
GM.desc: Called when the player spawns for the first time.

GM.name: PlayerJoinTeam
GM.desc: Makes the player join a specified team.

GM.name: PlayerLeaveVehicle
GM.desc: Called when a player leaves a vehicle.

GM.name: PlayerLoadout
GM.desc: Called to give players the default set of weapons.

GM.name: PlayerNoClip
GM.desc: Called when a player tries to switch noclip mode.

GM.name: PlayerPostThink
GM.desc: Called after the player's think.

GM.name: PlayerRequestTeam
GM.desc: Request a player to join the team. This function will check if the team is available to join or not.

GM.name: PlayerSay
GM.desc: Called when a player dispatched a chat message. For the clientside equivalent, see {{HookFunction|GM|OnPlayerChat}}.

GM.name: PlayerSelectSpawn
GM.desc: Called whenever a player dies and needs to respawn.

GM.name: PlayerSelectTeamSpawn
GM.desc: Find a team spawn point entity for this player.

GM.name: PlayerSetHandsModel
GM.desc: Called whenever view model hands needs setting a model. By default this calls {{HookFunction|PLAYER|GetHandsModel}} and if that fails, sets the hands model according to his player model.

GM.name: PlayerSetModel
GM.desc: Called whenever a player spawns and must choose a model. A good place to assign a model to a player.

GM.name: PlayerShouldTakeDamage
GM.desc: Returns true if the player should take damage from the given attacker.

GM.name: PlayerShouldTaunt
GM.desc: Allows to suppress player taunts.

GM.name: PlayerSilentDeath
GM.desc: Called when the player is killed by {{ClassFunction|Player|KillSilent}}.

GM.name: PlayerSpawn
GM.desc: Called whenever a player spawned.

GM.name: PlayerSpawnAsSpectator
GM.desc: Called to spawn the player as a spectator.

GM.name: PlayerSpray
GM.desc: Called whenever a player sprayed his logo to allow or disallow spraying.

GM.name: PlayerStartTaunt
GM.desc: Called when player starts taunting.

GM.name: PlayerStartVoice
GM.desc: Called when a player starts using voice chat.

GM.name: PlayerStepSoundTime
GM.desc: Allows you to override the time between footsteps.

GM.name: PlayerSwitchFlashlight
GM.desc: Called whenever a player attempts to either turn on or off their flashlight, returning false will deny the change.

GM.name: PlayerSwitchWeapon
GM.desc: Called when a player switches their weapon. It is not called clientside in singleplayer.

GM.name: PlayerTick
GM.desc: Runs for every player's tick.

GM.name: PlayerTraceAttack
GM.desc: Called when a player has been hit by a trace and damaged (such as from a bullet). Returning true overrides the damage handling and prevents {{HookFunction|GM|ScalePlayerDamage}} from being called.

GM.name: PlayerUnfrozeObject
GM.desc: Called when a player unfreezes an object.

GM.name: PlayerUse
GM.desc: Triggered when the player presses use on an object. Continuously runs until USE is released but will not activate other Entities until the USE key is released; dependent on activation type of the Entity.

GM.name: PopulateMenuBar
GM.desc: Called when it's time to populate the context menu menu bar at the top.

GM.name: PopulateSTOOLMenu
GM.desc: Called to populate the Scripted Tool menu.

GM.name: PopulateToolMenu
GM.desc: Add the STOOLS to the tool menu. You want to call {{LibraryFunction|spawnmenu|AddToolMenuOption}} in this hook.

GM.name: PostCleanupMap
GM.desc: Called right after the map has cleaned up (usually because {{LibraryFunction|game|CleanUpMap}} was called)

GM.name: PostDraw2DSkyBox
GM.desc: Called right after the 2D skybox has been drawn - allowing you to draw over it.

GM.name: PostDrawEffects
GM.desc: Called after rendering effects. This is where halos are drawn.

GM.name: PostDrawHUD
GM.desc: Called after {{HookFunction|GM|PreDrawHUD}},  {{HookFunction|GM|HUDPaintBackground}} and {{HookFunction|GM|HUDPaint}} but before  {{HookFunction|GM|DrawOverlay}}.

GM.name: PostDrawOpaqueRenderables
GM.desc: Called after drawing opaque entities.

GM.name: PostDrawPlayerHands
GM.desc: Called after the player hands are drawn.

GM.name: PostDrawSkyBox
GM.desc: Called after drawing the skybox.

GM.name: PostDrawTranslucentRenderables
GM.desc: Called after all translucent entites are drawn.

GM.name: PostDrawViewModel
GM.desc: Called after view model is drawn.

GM.name: PostGamemodeLoaded
GM.desc: Called after the gamemode has loaded.

GM.name: PostPlayerDeath
GM.desc: Called right after {{HookFunction|GM|DoPlayerDeath}} and {{HookFunction|GM|PlayerSilentDeath}}.

GM.name: PostPlayerDraw
GM.desc: Called after the player was drawn.

GM.name: PostProcessPermitted
GM.desc: Allows you to suppress post processing effect drawing.

GM.name: PostReloadToolsMenu
GM.desc: Called right after the Lua Loaded tool menus are reloaded. This is a good place to set up any ControlPanels.

GM.name: PostRender
GM.desc: Called after the frame has been rendered.

GM.name: PostRenderVGUI
GM.desc: Called after the VGUI has been drawn.

GM.name: PreCleanupMap
GM.desc: Called right before the map cleans up (usually because {{LibraryFunction|game|CleanUpMap}} was called)

GM.name: PreDrawEffects
GM.desc: Called before rendering effects.

GM.name: PreDrawHalos
GM.desc: Called before rendering the halos. This is the place to call {{LibraryFunction|halo|Add}}.

GM.name: PreDrawHUD
GM.desc: Called before any of 2D drawing functions. Drawing anything in it seems to work incorrectly.

GM.name: PreDrawOpaqueRenderables
GM.desc: Called before all opaque entities are drawn.

GM.name: PreDrawPlayerHands
GM.desc: Called before the player hands are drawn.

GM.name: PreDrawSkyBox
GM.desc: Called before the sky box is drawn.

GM.name: PreDrawTranslucentRenderables
GM.desc: Called before all the translucent entities are drawn.

GM.name: PreDrawViewModel
GM.desc: Called before the view model has been drawn. This hook by default also calls this on weapons, so you can use {{HookFunction|WEAPON|PreDrawViewModel}}.

GM.name: PreGamemodeLoaded
GM.desc: Called before the gamemode is loaded.

GM.name: PrePlayerDraw
GM.desc: Called before the player is drawn.

GM.name: PreReloadToolsMenu
GM.desc: Called right before the Lua Loaded tool menus are reloaded.

GM.name: PreRender
GM.desc: Called before the renderer is about to start rendering the next frame.

GM.name: PreventScreenClicks
GM.desc: This will prevent IN_ATTACK from sending to server when player tries to shoot from C menu.

GM.name: PropBreak
GM.desc: Called when a prop has been destroyed.

GM.name: RenderScene
GM.desc: Render the scene. Used by the "Stereoscopy" Post-processing effect.

GM.name: RenderScreenspaceEffects
GM.desc: Used to render post processing effects.

GM.name: Restored
GM.desc: Called when the game is loaded from a saved game.

GM.name: Saved
GM.desc: Called when the game is saved using source engine built-in save system.

GM.name: ScaleNPCDamage
GM.desc: Called when an NPC takes damage.

GM.name: ScalePlayerDamage
GM.desc: This hook allows you to change how much damage a player receives when one takes damage to a specific body part.

GM.name: ScoreboardHide
GM.desc: Called when player released the scoreboard button. ( TAB by default )

GM.name: ScoreboardShow
GM.desc: Called when player presses the scoreboard button. ( TAB by default )

GM.name: SetPlayerSpeed
GM.desc: Sets player run and sprint speeds.

GM.name: SetupMove
GM.desc: SetupMove is called before the engine process movements. This allows us to override the players movement.

GM.name: SetupPlayerVisibility
GM.desc: Allows you to add extra positions to the player's PVS. This is the place to call {{GlobalFunction|AddOriginToPVS}}.

GM.name: SetupSkyboxFog
GM.desc: Allows you to use render.Fog* functions to manipulate skybox fog.

GM.name: SetupWorldFog
GM.desc: Allows you to use render.Fog* functions to manipulate world fog.

GM.name: ShouldCollide
GM.desc: Called whenever the engine wants to poll two entities should be able to collide. Only works if at least one of the entities has had {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetCustomCollisionCheck}} called on it.

GM.name: ShouldDrawLocalPlayer
GM.desc: Allows you to draw {{GlobalFunction|LocalPlayer}}. ( Yourself )

GM.name: ShowHelp
GM.desc: Called when a player executes gm_showhelp console command. ( Default bind is F1 )

GM.name: ShowSpare1
GM.desc: Called when a player executes gm_showspare1 console command. ( Default bind is F3 )

GM.name: ShowSpare2
GM.desc: Called when a player executes gm_showspare2 console command. ( Default bind is F4 )

GM.name: ShowTeam
GM.desc: Called when a player executes gm_showteam console command. ( Default bind is F2 )

GM.name: ShutDown
GM.desc: Called whenever the lua environment is about to be shut down.

GM.name: SpawniconGenerated
GM.desc: Called when spawn icon is generated.

GM.name: StartChat
GM.desc: Runs when the user tries to open the chat box.

GM.name: StartCommand
GM.desc: Allows you to change the players inputs before they are processed by the server.

GM.name: StartEntityDriving
GM.desc: Called right before an entity starts driving. Overriding this hook will cause it to not call [[drive/Start]] and the player will not begin driving the entity.

GM.name: Think
GM.desc: Called every frame on client and every tick on server.

GM.name: Tick
GM.desc: Called every server tick.

GM.name: TranslateActivity
GM.desc: Allows you to translate player activities.

GM.name: UpdateAnimation
GM.desc: Animation updates (pose params etc) should be done here.

GM.name: VariableEdited
GM.desc: Called when a variable is edited on an Entity (called by Edit Properties... menu)

GM.name: VehicleMove
GM.desc: Called when you are driving a vehicle. This hook works just like {{HookFunction|GM|Move}}.

GM.name: VGUIMousePressAllowed
GM.desc: [[Category:Menu_Hooks]] Called when user clicks on a VGUI panel.

GM.name: VGUIMousePressed
GM.desc: [[Category:Menu_Hooks]] Called when a mouse button is pressed on a VGUI element or menu.

GM.name: WeaponEquip
GM.desc: Called as a weapon entity is picked up by a player.

GM.name: WorkshopDownloadedFile
GM.desc: Called when an addon from the Steam workshop finishes downloading. Used by default to update details on the workshop downloading panel.

GM.name: WorkshopDownloadFile
GM.desc: Called when an addon from the Steam workshop begins downloading. Used by default to place details on the workshop downloading panel.

GM.name: WorkshopDownloadProgress
GM.desc: Called while an addon from the Steam workshop is downloading. Used by default to update details on the fancy workshop download panel.

GM.name: WorkshopDownloadTotals
GM.desc: Called after {{HookFunction|GM|WorkshopStart}}.

GM.name: WorkshopEnd
GM.desc: Called when downloading content from Steam workshop ends. Used by default to hide fancy workshop downloading panel.

GM.name: WorkshopStart
GM.desc: Called when downloading content from Steam workshop begins. Used by default to show fancy workshop downloading panel.

NEXTBOT.name: BehaveUpdate
NEXTBOT.desc: Called to update the bot's behaviour.

NEXTBOT.name: BodyUpdate
NEXTBOT.desc: Called to update the bot's animation.

NEXTBOT.name: OnContact
NEXTBOT.desc: Called when the nextbot touches another entity.

NEXTBOT.name: OnIgnite
NEXTBOT.desc: Called when the bot is ignited.

NEXTBOT.name: OnInjured
NEXTBOT.desc: Called when the bot gets hurt.

NEXTBOT.name: OnKilled
NEXTBOT.desc: Called when the bot gets killed.

NEXTBOT.name: OnLandOnGround
NEXTBOT.desc: Called when the bot's feet return to the ground.

NEXTBOT.name: OnLeaveGround
NEXTBOT.desc: Called when the bot's feet leave the ground - for whatever reason.

NEXTBOT.name: OnNavAreaChanged
NEXTBOT.desc: Called when the nextbot enters a new navigation area.

NEXTBOT.name: OnOtherKilled
NEXTBOT.desc: Called when someone else or something else has been killed.

NEXTBOT.name: OnStuck
NEXTBOT.desc: Called when the bot thinks it is stuck.

NEXTBOT.name: OnUnStuck
NEXTBOT.desc: Called when the bot thinks it is un-stuck.

NEXTBOT.name: Use
NEXTBOT.desc: Called when a player 'uses' the entity.

PANEL.name: ActionSignal
PANEL.desc: Called whenever a panel receives a command signal from one of its children.

PANEL.name: AnimationThink
PANEL.desc: Called every frame if animation is enabled. Note that if you want to disable this hook, you must call {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetAnimationEnabled}} after defining this function.

PANEL.name: ApplySchemeSettings
PANEL.desc: Called whenever the panel should apply its scheme(style).

PANEL.name: FinishedURL
PANEL.desc: Called by HTML panels when the page has finished loading. Currently broken.

PANEL.name: Init
PANEL.desc: Called when the panel is created. This is called for each base type that the panel has.

PANEL.name: OnChildAdded
PANEL.desc: Called whenever a child was parented to the panel.

PANEL.name: OnChildRemoved
PANEL.desc: Called whenever a child of the panel is about to removed.

PANEL.name: OnCursorEntered
PANEL.desc: Called whenever the cursor entered the panels bounds.

PANEL.name: OnCursorExited
PANEL.desc: Called whenever the cursor left the panels bounds.

PANEL.name: OnCursorMoved
PANEL.desc: Called whenever the cursor was moved with the panels bounds.

PANEL.name: OnFocusChanged
PANEL.desc: Called whenever the panel gained or lost focus.

PANEL.name: OnKeyCodePressed
PANEL.desc: Called whenever a keyboard key was pressed while the panel is focused.

PANEL.name: OnMousePressed
PANEL.desc: Called whenever a mouse key was pressed while the panel is focused.

PANEL.name: OnMouseReleased
PANEL.desc: Called whenever a mouse key was released while the panel is focused.

PANEL.name: OnMouseWheeled
PANEL.desc: Called whenever the mouse wheel was used.

PANEL.name: OnRemove
PANEL.desc: Called when the panel is about to be removed.

PANEL.name: OpeningURL
PANEL.desc: Called by HTML panels when the page has started to load. Currently broken.

PANEL.name: PageTitleChanged
PANEL.desc: Called by HTML panels when the title of the page has changed. Currently broken.

PANEL.name: Paint
PANEL.desc: Called whenever the panel should be drawn.

PANEL.name: PaintOver
PANEL.desc: Called whenever the panel and all its children were drawn, return true to override the default drawing.

PANEL.name: PerformLayout
PANEL.desc: {{Validate}}Called whenever the panels layout was invalidated, all children are moved to 0,0 by default and need to re positioned.

PANEL.name: ResourceLoaded
PANEL.desc: Called by HTML panels when a web resource is loaded. Currently broken.

PANEL.name: StatusChanged
PANEL.desc: Called by HTML panels when the current status has changed. Currently broken.

PANEL.name: Think
PANEL.desc: Called every frame while {{ClassFunction|Panel|IsVisible}} is true.

PLAYER.name: GetHandsModel
PLAYER.desc: Called on player spawn to determine which hand model to use

PLAYER.name: Init
PLAYER.desc: Called when the class object is created

PLAYER.name: Loadout
PLAYER.desc: Called on spawn to give the player their default loadout

PLAYER.name: PostDrawViewModel
PLAYER.desc: Called after the viewmodel has been drawn

PLAYER.name: PreDrawViewModel
PLAYER.desc: Called before the viewmodel is drawn

PLAYER.name: SetModel
PLAYER.desc: Called when we need to set player model from the class.

PLAYER.name: SetupDataTables
PLAYER.desc: Set up the network table accessors

PLAYER.name: ViewModelChanged
PLAYER.desc: Called when the player changes their weapon to another one causing their viewmodel model to change

SANDBOX.name: AddGamemodeToolMenuCategories
SANDBOX.desc: {{Internal}}

SANDBOX.name: AddGamemodeToolMenuTabs
SANDBOX.desc: {{Internal}}

SANDBOX.name: AddToolMenuCategories
SANDBOX.desc: This hook is used to add new categories to spawnmenu tool tabs.

SANDBOX.name: AddToolMenuTabs
SANDBOX.desc: This hook is used to add new tool tabs to spawnmenu.

SANDBOX.name: CanDrive
SANDBOX.desc: Called when a player attempts to drive a prop via Prop Drive

SANDBOX.name: CanProperty
SANDBOX.desc: Controls if a property can be used or not.

SANDBOX.name: CanTool
SANDBOX.desc: Called when a player attempts to fire their tool gun. Return true to specifically allow the attempt, false to block it.

SANDBOX.name: ContentSidebarSelection
SANDBOX.desc: Called when player selects an item on the spawnmenu sidebar at the left.

SANDBOX.name: PersistenceLoad
SANDBOX.desc: Called when persistent props are loaded.

SANDBOX.name: PersistenceSave
SANDBOX.desc: Called when persistent props are saved.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerGiveSWEP
SANDBOX.desc: Called when a player attempts to give themselves a weapon from the Q menu. ( Left mouse clicks on an icon )

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnedEffect
SANDBOX.desc: Called after the player spawned an effect.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnedNPC
SANDBOX.desc: Called after the player spawned an NPC.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnedProp
SANDBOX.desc: Called when a player has successfully spawned a prop from the Q menu.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnedRagdoll
SANDBOX.desc: Called after the player spawned a ragdoll.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnedSENT
SANDBOX.desc: Called after the player has spawned a scripted entity.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnedSWEP
SANDBOX.desc: Called after the player has spawned a scripted weapon.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnedVehicle
SANDBOX.desc: Called after the player spawned a vehicle.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnEffect
SANDBOX.desc: Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular effect or not.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnNPC
SANDBOX.desc: Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular NPC or not.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnObject
SANDBOX.desc: Called to ask whether player is allowed to spawn any objects.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnProp
SANDBOX.desc: Called when a player attempts to spawn a prop from the Q menu.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnRagdoll
SANDBOX.desc: Called when a player attempts to spawn a ragdoll from the Q menu.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnSENT
SANDBOX.desc: Called when a player attempts to spawn an Entity from the Q menu.

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnSWEP
SANDBOX.desc: Called when a player attempts to spawn a weapon from the Q menu. ( Mouse wheel clicks on an icon )

SANDBOX.name: PlayerSpawnVehicle
SANDBOX.desc: Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular vehicle or not.

SANDBOX.name: PopulatePropMenu
SANDBOX.desc: This hook makes the engine load the spawnlist text files.

SANDBOX.name: SpawnMenuEnabled
SANDBOX.desc: If false is returned then the spawn menu is never created.

SANDBOX.name: SpawnMenuOpen
SANDBOX.desc: Called when spawnmenu is trying to be opened.

TOOL.name: Deploy
TOOL.desc: Called when {{HookFunction|WEAPON|Deploy}} of the toolgun is called.

TOOL.name: DrawHUD
TOOL.desc: Called when {{HookFunction|WEAPON|DrawHUD}} of the toolgun is called, only when the user has this tool selected.

TOOL.name: DrawToolScreen
TOOL.desc: Called after the default tool screen has been drawn.

TOOL.name: FreezeMovement
TOOL.desc: Called when {{HookFunction|WEAPON|Think}} of the toolgun is called, only when the user has this tool selected.

TOOL.name: Holster
TOOL.desc: Called when {{HookFunction|WEAPON|Holster}} of the toolgun is called.

TOOL.name: LeftClick
TOOL.desc: Called when the user left clicks with the tool

TOOL.name: Reload
TOOL.desc: Called when the user presses the reload key with the tool out.

TOOL.name: RightClick
TOOL.desc: Called when the user right clicks with the tool.

TOOL.name: Think
TOOL.desc: Called when {{HookFunction|WEAPON|Think}} of the toolgun is called. This only happens when the tool gun is currently equipped/selected by the player and the selected tool is this tool.

SWEP.name: AcceptInput
SWEP.desc: Called when another entity fires an event to this entity.

SWEP.name: AdjustMouseSensitivity
SWEP.desc: Allows you to adjust the mouse sensitivity. This hook only works if you haven't overridden {{HookFunction|GM|AdjustMouseSensitivity}}.

SWEP.name: Ammo1
SWEP.desc: Returns how much of primary ammo the player has.

SWEP.name: Ammo2
SWEP.desc: Returns how much of secondary ammo the player has.

SWEP.name: CalcView
SWEP.desc: Allows you to adjust player view while this weapon in use.

SWEP.name: CalcViewModelView
SWEP.desc: Allows overriding the position and angle of the viewmodel. This hook only works if you haven't overridden {{HookFunction|GM|CalcViewModelView}}.

SWEP.name: CanPrimaryAttack
SWEP.desc: Helper function for checking for no ammo.

SWEP.name: CanSecondaryAttack
SWEP.desc: Helper function for checking for no ammo.

SWEP.name: ContextScreenClick
SWEP.desc: Called when the Context Menu ( Default key C ) is open and the player has clicked the screen.

SWEP.name: CustomAmmoDisplay
SWEP.desc: Allows you to use any numbers you want for the ammo display on the HUD.

SWEP.name: Deploy
SWEP.desc: Called when player has just switched to this weapon.

SWEP.name: DoDrawCrosshair
SWEP.desc: Called when the crosshair is about to get drawn, and allows you to override it.

SWEP.name: DoImpactEffect
SWEP.desc: Called so the weapon can override the impact effects it makes.

SWEP.name: DrawHUD
SWEP.desc: This hook allows you to draw on screen while this weapon is in use.

SWEP.name: DrawHUDBackground
SWEP.desc: This hook allows you to draw on screen while this weapon is in use. This hook is called '''before''' {{HookFunction|WEAPON|DrawHUD}} and is equivalent of {{HookFunction|GM|HUDPaintBackground}}.

SWEP.name: DrawWeaponSelection
SWEP.desc: This hook draws the selection icon in the weapon selection menu.

SWEP.name: DrawWorldModel
SWEP.desc: Called when we are about to draw the world model.

SWEP.name: DrawWorldModelTranslucent
SWEP.desc: Called when we are about to draw the translucent world model.

SWEP.name: Equip
SWEP.desc: Called when a player or NPC has picked the weapon up.

SWEP.name: EquipAmmo
SWEP.desc: The player has picked up the weapon and has taken the ammo from it.

SWEP.name: FireAnimationEvent
SWEP.desc: Called before firing animation events, such as muzzle flashes or shell ejections.

SWEP.name: FreezeMovement
SWEP.desc: This hook allows you to freeze players screen. NOTE: Player will still be able to move or shoot!

SWEP.name: GetCapabilities
SWEP.desc: This hook is for NPCs, you return what they should try to do with it.

SWEP.name: GetTracerOrigin
SWEP.desc: Allows you to override where the tracer effect comes from. ( Visual bullets )

SWEP.name: GetViewModelPosition
SWEP.desc: This hook allows you to adjust view model position and angles.

SWEP.name: Holster
SWEP.desc: Called when weapon tries to holster.

SWEP.name: HUDShouldDraw
SWEP.desc: This hook determines which parts of the HUD to draw.

SWEP.name: Initialize
SWEP.desc: Called when the weapon entity is created.

SWEP.name: KeyValue
SWEP.desc: Called when the engine sets a value for this swep.

SWEP.name: OnDrop
SWEP.desc: Called when weapon is dropped by {{ClassFunction|Player|DropWeapon}}.

SWEP.name: OnReloaded
SWEP.desc: Called whenever the weapons Lua script is reloaded.

SWEP.name: OnRemove
SWEP.desc: Called when the swep is about to be removed.

SWEP.name: OnRestore
SWEP.desc: Called when the swep was reloaded from a save game.

SWEP.name: OwnerChanged
SWEP.desc: Called when weapon is dropped or picked up by a new player.

SWEP.name: PostDrawViewModel
SWEP.desc: Allows you to modify viewmodel while the weapon in use after the view model has been drawn. This hook only works if you haven't overridden {{HookFunction|GM|PostDrawViewModel}}.

SWEP.name: PreDrawViewModel
SWEP.desc: Allows you to modify viewmodel while the weapon in use before it is drawn. This hook only works if you haven't overridden {{HookFunction|GM|PreDrawViewModel}}.

SWEP.name: PrimaryAttack
SWEP.desc: Called when primary attack button ( +attack ) is pressed.

SWEP.name: PrintWeaponInfo
SWEP.desc: A convenience function that draws the weapon info box, used in {{HookFunction|WEAPON|DrawWeaponSelection}}.

SWEP.name: Reload
SWEP.desc: Called when the reload key ( +reload ) is pressed.

SWEP.name: RenderScreen
SWEP.desc: Called every frame to render screens. SWEP alternative of {{HookFunction|GM|DrawMonitors}}?

SWEP.name: SecondaryAttack
SWEP.desc: Called when secondary attack button ( +attack2 ) is pressed.

SWEP.name: SetDeploySpeed
SWEP.desc: Sets the weapon deploy speed. This value needs to match on client and server.

SWEP.name: SetupDataTables
SWEP.desc: Called when the SWEP should set up its [[Networking Entities| Data Tables]].

SWEP.name: SetWeaponHoldType
SWEP.desc: Sets the hold type of the weapon. This must be called on '''both''' the server and the client to work properly.

SWEP.name: ShootBullet
SWEP.desc: A convenience function to shoot bullets.

SWEP.name: ShootEffects
SWEP.desc: A convenience function to create shoot effects.

SWEP.name: ShouldDropOnDie
SWEP.desc: Should this weapon be dropped when its owner dies?

SWEP.name: TakePrimaryAmmo
SWEP.desc: A convenience function to remove primary ammo from clip.

SWEP.name: TakeSecondaryAmmo
SWEP.desc: A convenience function to remove secondary ammo from clip.

SWEP.name: Think
SWEP.desc: Called when the swep thinks.

SWEP.name: TranslateActivity
SWEP.desc: Translate a player's Activity into a weapon's activity, depending on how you want the player to be holding the weapon.

SWEP.name: TranslateFOV
SWEP.desc: Allows to change players Field Of View while player holds the weapon.

SWEP.name: ViewModelDrawn
SWEP.desc: Called straight after the view model has been drawn.
